reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved it! Liane Moriarty skillfully intertwines humor, mystery, and drama in this page-turner. The characters are relatable, the plot twists are unexpected, and the social commentary is thought-provoking. Couldn't put it down!
A captivating read with well-developed characters and a compelling storyline. The exploration of friendship, secrets, and societal pressures kept me engaged throughout. Thoroughly enjoyed it!
Enjoyable, but somewhat predictable. While the characters were interesting, the plot lacked depth in certain areas. The pacing felt uneven at times. Overall, a decent read.
Brilliantly written! Liane Moriarty's storytelling is gripping and immersive. The layers of intrigue and suspense kept me guessing until the very end. Highly recommend!
Engaging and entertaining! The multiple perspectives added depth to the narrative, and the themes explored are relevant and thought-provoking. Thoroughly enjoyed the twists and turns!
